statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
SELECT product_id, current_stock, product_name FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_name, max_stock_threshold FROM inventory_tracking WHERE max_stock_threshold > current_stock;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking WHERE current_stock < min_stock_threshold;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT AVG(current_stock) AS avg_stock, MAX(max_stock_threshold) AS max_threshold FROM inventory_tracking;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < safety_stock;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock, safety_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity FROM inventory INNER JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, current_stock ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, safety_stock FROM inventory WHERE current_stock < safety_stock;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_point FROM inventory WHERE reorder_point > current_stock * 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.status = 'pending';
SELECT order_id, product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM inventory JOIN orders ON inventory.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.order_quantity > inventory.current_stock;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE current_inventory > 50
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, current_inventory, reorder_threshold FROM products WHERE reorder_threshold < 20
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-02-28'
SELECT product_id, SUM(order_quantity) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_orders > 100
SELECT * FROM products WHERE current_inventory > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_inventory FROM products WHERE reorder_threshold < current_inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_inventory FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND current_inventory < 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.order_quantity > 10 AND products.reorder_threshold < 50 ORDER BY orders.order_quantity DESC, products.product_name ASC;

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.customer_name, products.product_name, reorders.status FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN reorders ON products.product_id = reorders.product_id WHERE reorders.reorder_quantity > orders.order_quantity AND orders.order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_threshold FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE status = 'shipped';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, current_stock DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, current_stock, reorder_threshold FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold;
SELECT customer_name, Orders.order_id, product_name, quantity FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, reorder_date FROM ReorderHistory WHERE quantity_ordered > 10 ORDER BY reorder_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, current_stock FROM inventory_items ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE current_stock < reorder_threshold ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, current_stock, reorder_threshold FROM inventory_items JOIN orders ON inventory_items.item_id = orders.item_id WHERE orders.quantity > 50 ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, order_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
